ygData.subject: Re: ok Mike I dont know if you were trying to dispute my info but heres a story for ya.......
ygData.msgSnippet: Just to Clarify: I know Borxx is a VERY high level Evil-Eye (25-35??). I was just saying that I have seen him on the main level in RunnyEye and you don t have
ygData.messageBody:
Just to Clarify:

I know Borxx is a VERY high level Evil-Eye (25-35??). I was just saying
that I have seen him on the main level in RunnyEye and you don't have to
go down into the dungeon to run into him. Magik's email just confirms
this as he states a friend zoned into RunnyEye from Beholder and got
zapped by Borxx.

The original email stated:
"Borxx ... can be found in the bottom of the dungeon ..."


-----Original Message-----
From: Magik [mailto:aarongb@...]
Sent: Tuesday, April 20, 1999 1:33 PM
To: JMiko@...
Subject: ok Mike I dont know if you were trying to dispute my info but
heres a story for ya.......


I have a Halfling Cleric friend that is level 22......he was coming thru
Beholder with two eyes in tail and zoned.......when he zoned he had full
health bar......he zoned into Runnyeye and Borxx was stadning in front
of
him and hit him with a lightning spell......the msg said you have been
hit
but lighting please wait......he was blasted bak 10 STEPS!!!.....into
the
Beholder Zone BAKWARDS!!!......and when he rezoned he watched his
hitpoints
go from FULL to a SLIVER OF A BAR!!!!!.......Borrxx is like level 35 but
if
youd like to try him be my guest......and I as well have a 16th lvl
Druid in
Rivervale......but the entrance is NOT what Im talking about....the
front
part and upstaris is VERY easy......and you can get thru it
easily....with
NO TROUBLE>.....but go any further inside and your toast.......TRUST ME
ON
THIS!!!


Elite Wall Commander of Misty Thicket
Deputy Dreffan Tempestborn
